security: The attached report is being classified "Confidential" as it reveals our investigative interest in the members of various foreign diplomatic establishments.
summary: This FBI document outlines investigative leads and sources of information related to an unidentified subject, including contacts with foreign diplomatic establishments and possible links to individuals of interest. It details interactions, source information, and notes the classification is due to investigative interest in foreign diplomatic members.
summary_one_paragraph: This FBI document, dated September 30, 1958, from the SAC of the WMFO to the Director of the FBI, details investigative leads and sources of information pertaining to an unidentified subject. The report lists various sources (T-4 through T-12) and their provided information, including contacts with George P. Richards and William Goldburg, as well as data furnished by a CIA letter regarding Petar Mihaldinec. The document is classified as 'Confidential' because it reveals the FBI's investigative interest in members of foreign diplomatic establishments in the Washington, D.C., area, with the intention to consider interviewing the subject upon completion of the listed leads.
sender: SAC, WMFO(Washington Metropolitan Field Office). (Probably Special Agent in Charge, Washington Metropolitan Field Office.)
